DOC.brief_summary: Optovue has developed a new feature for mapping corneal epithelial thickness. The purpose of the study is to evaluate the accuracy and repeatability of the epithelial thickness measurement. Consented subjects will undergo a series of cornea measurements using optical coherence tomography (OCT) that will be used for analysis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Corneal Epithelial Thickness Mapping
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Able and willing to provide consent Able and willing to complete the required examinations DRY EYE GROUP ONLY: Clinical diagnosis of dry eye CONTACT LENS GROUP ONLY: Regular contact lens wear History of ocular surgery History of laser refractive surgery History of cataract surgery DRY EYE GROUP ONLY: Corneal pathology not associated with dry eye CONTACT LENS GROUP ONLY: Corneal pathology including dry eye NORMAL GROUP ONLY: History of contact lens wear or dry eye or corneal pathology
